basic_data.name: Secret City Adventures - Casa Loma Escape Series

description: Founded in 2012, our mission is to design immersive experiences that push the boundaries of adventurous entertainment. We are pioneers of creating theatrical escape room games in Toronto, including the Casa Loma Escape Series, Black Creek Pioneer Village Escape Series, and the official Murdoch Mysteries escape room. In partnership with world-renowned SCRAP Entertainment we have produced and toured the original genre-defining Real Escape Games across Canada.

reviews.title: Very unique escape room
text: I did the Murdoch Mysteries escape room with a group of 6 friends. The story and actors made this a very immersive experience. There was a good variety of puzzles, and they felt pretty original but still challenging.
I will note that we booked the whole room, whereas otherwise there is a risk of being paired with strangers.

reviews.title: Dragon's Song was a magical experience
text: The Dragon's Song ruined me for all other escape rooms. It was beyond incredible! The actors were amazing and the puzzles were fun. It was a beautiful set up and it was a magical experience. It was one of the best parts of my trip and I'd do it again! My only regret is not wearing a costume.

reviews.title: Brilliant
text: Absolutely loved this with a fantastic storyline.  I was unsure about doing a puzzle room with strangers but there were enough puzzles around the room that it was easy to divide and conquer.  I also loved the interaction with the actors, they were brilliant and made the escape room truly unique

reviews.title: Good fun
text: This was great fun. It was our first time doing the escape room in a team with strangers so it proved more difficult than we usually find them, but nonetheless it was fun and both the set up and the actors are really good! This was far more enjoyable than Casa Loma itself.

reviews.title: There are better escape rooms elsewhere.  Do not recommend the ones in Casa Loma
text: Extremely difficult. Almost impossible to solve. Less than 10% success rate. That’s very frustrating. 12 random people with an actor that keeps on yelling at you to hurry up. Do not try this place if this is your first time doing a escape room. Try others that are easier to solve and  in a smaller and private group.

reviews.title: The Escape Room experience at Casa Loma is wonderfully done and was our favorite activity!
text: Highly recommend!
The whole experience, from booking to checking in to participating during and after the escape room experience was so great.

The escape room itself was amazing - the authentic decor, atmosphere, and live actors transformed us into knights on a quest to save Avalon.  The clues were just hard enough, and the actors did a great job of not only enhancing the experience but being available for questions while not giving us the answers to the riddles and puzzles, etc.

To cap it off, our family completed the last level of the escape room tower adventure with only 3 seconds to spare.  Three seconds!  The excitement we felt was immense, and the actors also had a genuine shock and awe reaction.  It was our favorite activity during our visit to Toronto and we would do it again (there are several different options to choose from).
Book this experience.  You will not be sorry!  It's an adventure in an actual castle - who wouldn't want to do it?!

reviews.title: Best Escape Room Ever!
text: This was hands down the BEST escape room I have every visited. It was more like immersive theater. The actors were great. There were two kids in our group and the actors were able to give just the right amount of guidance to ensure that the kids were included in the puzzles.

reviews.title: Escape Magic!
text: We loved this experience! We did the Dragon’s Song. Escape room and theater combined! We took our 13 year old nephew and he was thrilled with the interaction with the actors, especially Sir Rowan. The puzzles were challenging but fun for all ages- there were two younger kids in the group and plenty for all 12 of us in total to keep us busy. The decor is magical and it was a real treat for us, a highlight of our vacation in Toronto.

reviews.title: Lots of fun and challenge
text: Great experience! Awesome actors and very challenging room. We come from abroad and even though english is not our first language we had at great time and understood the story and the tasks.

reviews.title: Murdock Mystery escape room was amazing!
text: We did the Murdock Mystery escape room.  We had a blast.  Actors were fantastic.   Would definitely recommend.   You will definitely be challenged.

reviews.title: Lovely Staff
text: The staff was amazing. They were so fun and lively i had a blast doing the escape room! I would recommend this to anyone going to the area. The castle is gorgeous as well.

reviews.title: We escaped!
text: This was my first escape room ever. It might have to be my last. I live in the United States, and I really don’t think another escape room would ever live up to this. I loved the actors, in the escape room. They were amazing!

reviews.title: Great time at the murdoch mystery room
text: This room is great. The wonderful setting and the great actors make you feel right in the middle of murdoch mystery serie. The puzzles are challenging and require acute observation skills combined with some creative thinking and are a lot of fun. The ideal numbers of players is probably 5 or 6, we were 4 and it was close...

reviews.title: Best escape room setting with actors
text: Very cool way to see the castle. We went way up into the castle tower. Love actors were also very fun.

reviews.title: Beautiful donuts saving the dragon
text: Nice acting from the actors, nice props and nice atmosphere. The puzzle kept us thinking and they were really well made. Good job!

reviews.title: Worth the Trip
text: My husband, our 12 & 14 year old and I drove from Niagara Falls to Toronto to experience the Dragon Song Escape Room.  Casa Loma is an amazing location, the puzzles were  challenging but not impossible.  Definitely not recommended for the under 12 crowd.

reviews.title: Escape room at Casa Loma is wonderful!
text: Highly recommend! We had a blast. The cast of King of the Bootleggers was wonderful. On top of that you can't beat Casa Loma as a venue. We did this on our last night of vacation in Toronto. If we'd had more time, I would have tried one of the other escape rooms.

reviews.title: An entertaining experience that we would do again.
text: This escape room experience was a lot of fun! We did Escape the Tower with our 3 children (11,11,13) and it was really enjoyable. The actors that were involved in the hour long event were the best part, they did an amazing job at entertaining and engaging the group. We were skeptical about playing with other members that we did not know but don’t let this be a deterrent because it ended up being a nice addition to the game. We would definitely sign up for another visit with Escape Casa Loma.

reviews.title: Can't wait until we go again!
text: Such a great experience! Loved it so much that we want to plan another trip to Toronto in the future so we can do another escape room. The actors were great and helped guide us when we struggled, but they never gave us the answers.

reviews.title: Dragon's Song - Fun Family Friendly Game
text: Best escape room we've ever done! The puzzles were both challenging and fun - my 9 year and old and 13 year old were both able to figure some of the puzzles out by themselves. The live actors really helped to enhance the experience and provided us with a truly personalized experience. There were several flights of steep stairs to climb, so that may be a challenge for some. Overall, this was a truly a hidden gem we happened to find! Highly recommend!

reviews.title: If you like puzzles and mysteries, do yourself a favour and experience the Murdoch escape room—what a fun time!!
text: The Murdoch Mysteries Escape Room was one of the most fun experiences I’ve ever had! Our group was a combination of folks who had done escape rooms before and several first timers and we all had a BLAST. Even the escape room veterans agreed this was by far the best of any they’d ever done. A couple of us were big Murdoch fans, but most weren’t familiar with the show, and the game was super fun either way. There’s plenty enough activity to keep everyone busy, and the only “complaint” was that that meant not everyone got a chance to see everything. The set design and clues are really well done. It was fun interacting with the actors, and they were very helpful without giving anything explicitly away. We would absolutely recommend the experience and are making plans to try more of the Casa Loma escape rooms now!

reviews.title: Amazing experience at Casa Loma escape room
text: Fabulous experience,  the actors were amazing and the puzzles challenging enough to be very fun. Highly recommend

reviews.title: Dragons Song at Casa Loma Escape Room.
text: Great for older teens and adults. Difficult although fun for kids the puzzle is complicated and takes quite a while to complete

reviews.title: The very best escape room experience Toronto has to offer
text: Wow I'm so many levels. This was the escape room experience I have been dreaming of. We did three rooms and they were all outstanding. The quality of the rooms the quality of the props the immersive scenery and an outstanding cast of actors make this a must-see for any escape room enthusiast or visitor to the area. And the setting at Casa Loma is just ridiculously over the top awesome. Was the highlight of our trip.

reviews.title: So much fun for a birthday party!
text: We booked The Dragon Song escape room to celebrate my daughter’s 12th birthday. Our group consisted of 9 kids and 2 grown ups. All of us had an amazing time! The actors were engaging, the puzzles were intriguing, and the props and decor really set the mood for our experience. Highly recommended!

reviews.title: So much fun!
text: Wow this is such a cool thing to do! We did the Murdoch Mysteries game. Casa Loma area is the perfect backdrop for this fun experience! It’s like no other escape room. You are immersed in an authentic atmosphere, with vintage props and excellent actors that help keep you engaged with the tasks at hand. Solving the mysteries take a lot of brain power but it’s very exhilarating! Great fun to do with friends and go to the Keg mansion for dinner after!

reviews.title: Cousin's Night Out
text: Twice a year, all my cousins come together and we do something fun. This time we chose Dragon Song Escape Room at Casa Loma. We had a great time! Our guide was amazing and when the video presentation wouldn't work, he jumped right in and told the back story of our quest. He did a better job then the video could have! Once we started, the actors were so animated and so involved, they really made us feel part of an actual quest. They subtly guided us when we were getting off track and celebrated with us when we conquered the Dragon Song! We had such a great time and will definitely be back to try other escape room! Highly recommend.

reviews.title: Perfect for team building
text: The game was not boring. It was totally engaging especially having awesome actors/actress! They engage the whole group to be involved and the puzzle are all well laid out.

reviews.title: We had a blast!
text: We had an absolute blast!  We have never done an escape room before, and we chose to experience this at Casa Loma.  We booked the Murdoch Mysteries - The Secret of Station House No. 4.  It was engaging, challenging, and fun all at the same time.  The actors were wonderful, and the game was well planned out.  I highly recommend.

reviews.title: Dragon’s Song Escape Room
text: The Dragon’s Song escape adventure was a great time.  Our group had 10 people with 6 kids ranging from 8-20 and everyone could actively participate.  The actors were great and in character. Everyone had a great time. My son is already planning his next event!

reviews.title: Murdoch Fans
text: If you are a fan of the show you will love it! Great puzzles to solve wonderful sets, props and fun actors to interact with.

reviews.title: 1000% Recommend!
text: We've done escape rooms before, but NEVER like this!! Fantastic experience with the addition of actors. They portrayed their characters so well and it felt authentic. We had so much fun! It is one of the most memorable moments of our family vacation to Toronto, ON. #teamvancouverites

reviews.title: Station M Escape Room review
text: We did the station M escape room. It was very immersive, the puzzles were challenging but with a full group of 12 we managed to solve it! Great experience and our guide was fantastic and very funny.

reviews.title: Best escape room ever
text: My nephew says "Best escape room I've ever done." and I'd have to agree. This is a top-notch Toronto experience in one of the city's most iconic landmarks. Great immersive escape room experience. The actors were excellent, and they really brought the story to life. The props and setting were immaculate. You really felt you were part of the story. Excellent for tourists and Torontonians alike.

reviews.title: Dragon song
text: Dragon song is a must do, so much fun for people of all ages! I went with my daughter who is 9 and she had a fantastic time  I highly recommend it.

reviews.title: Definitely a must do!!
text: The Murdoch Escape room was so much fun!  We had a group ages 12-70 & everyone enjoyed it and the actors were fun!  This escape room is super challenging,  bring lots of people to help out!

reviews.title: A fantastic activity for friends and families!!!
text: We had such a great time! Awesome props! Fantastic hosts!! The entourage made us feel like we were really spies trying to find the hostage. You really need a group effort to figure out the clues and to work together! We will definitely do this again!!!

reviews.title: Fun night out
text: The escape room was well done. The actors were fun to have!  We enjoyed the room. It was spacious so you don’t feel you are on top of people.
Would recommend trying the Casa Loma escape rooms!

reviews.title: Casa Loma Murdock Mystery Escape Great Adventure
text: We received the Murdock Mystery Escape as a Christmas gift. We chose Jan 14/24, we were the only 2 for the timeslot, it did make solving the case alittle more difficult as well we've never done an escape room before. After the game was over and you reflect, we could see so many things that were fairly obvious. We really enjoyed the event. Well done by everyone! Make sure you use the props before you leave take your pictures. No pictures allowed in the actual escape room.
We look forward to trying another Escape Room.

reviews.title: An Incredible Experience
text: My daughter wanted to do something special for her birthday, she chose the Case Loma Murdoch Mysteries Escape Room. We did it on New Year's Eve, there were 9 of us in our party, plus, joined by 2 others that we did not know.

We were initially greeted by one of the players who got us organized and prepared for the game. The details of what was expected were clear, though admittedly, as first timers to this type of experience, we really didn't ask enough questions before we got started.
ASK QUESTIONS!!!
The tasks themselves were not overly complicated but you do have to work hard, and work quickly.
TOUCH EVERYTHING!!!
LOOK AT EVERYTHING!!
Get people working on different tasks simultaneously.
We had a blast, it really was so much fun.
